sentences.en: a mirror in an ornate gold frame
Architectural decoration styles: vertical surface is brown, no ornate ornamented.
sentences.cn: 建筑装修风格: 立面为褐色, 无华丽的雕梁画栋.

sentences.en: Cooking , when money is no object, soon becomes ornate, overelaborate, amazing.
sentences.cn: 当钱算不了什么时, 烹调很快就成为雅 、 巧 、 奇样样具备的事了.

sentences.en: Furniture of the baroque period can be recognized by its ornate carvings.
sentences.cn: 巴罗克时期的家具以豪华的雕刻作为鉴别标志.

sentences.en: He creates very ornate handles for the famous Finnish knives by hand.
sentences.cn: 这种手工制作的装饰有华丽手柄的刀在芬兰非常出名.

sentences.en: He likes to use an ornate style when writing.
sentences.cn: 他写文章时喜欢雕砌词藻.

sentences.en: On the back in ornate lettering were the English words: " Professor May Din Lea. "
sentences.cn: 背面是花体英文字: “ ProfessorMayDinLea ”.

sentences.en: Ornate rhetoric taught out of the rule of plato.
sentences.cn: 与柏拉图所说的规则不相同的华丽的文辞.

sentences.en: Qingshitong shen from the towerdiao cheng, ornate carvings and delicate, very elegant.
sentences.cn: 该塔通身由青石雕成, 雕刻华丽细腻, 十分典雅精致.

sentences.en: Rich, ornate prose is hard to digest, generally unwholesome, and sometimes nauseating.
sentences.cn: 辞藻丰富华丽的文章很难消化, 一般来讲让人感到不适, 有时甚至恶心.

sentences.en: That is the ornate facade of the Palace.
sentences.cn: 那是宫殿装饰华丽的正面。

sentences.en: That style of architecture is too ornate for my taste.
sentences.cn: 那种建筑风格太华丽了,不对我的口味.

sentences.en: The frames on the pictures are ornate with flowers and fruit painted in gold.
sentences.cn: 照片的相框用金黄色的花朵和水果装饰得非常华丽.

sentences.en: The style is ornate and highly decorative.
sentences.cn: 这种风格很华丽,而且装饰效果很好.

sentences.en: Their waiter reappeared and presented two ornate menus with a flourish.
sentences.cn: 服务员又来了,精神抖擞地递上了两张讲究的菜单.

words.tran_cn: 装饰过分地；词藻华丽地
华丽的；装饰的；（文体）绚丽的

trans.tran_cn: 装饰华丽的，（文体）绚丽的，矫揉造作的
trans.tran_en: covered with a lot of decoration
